name: Leave it to The Saints
description:
Help the Saints taking down Steelport one more time. In Saints Row: Leave it to The Saints you can fight rival gangs, complete quests and collect upgrades to make it easier to take down hoods, districts and finally the entire city of Steelport.

⚜ City Take Over: Take Down the City of Steelport as you play as the boss of the 3RD Street Saints.
⚜ Quests: Complete small missions to boost cache income.
⚜ Upgrades: Invest in upgrades to boost Cache income, Genki's Murder Fest Cache income and more.
⚜ Geki's Murder Fest: Survive hordes of deadly Nuclear Missiles as you fly the Saints VTOL.
⚜ Storyline: Follow the Breath Taking Storyline based on a carton of Milk.
